title: Wall Street Breakfast June 26: GE To Spin-Off Its Healthcare Unit; China Stocks Enter Bear Territory
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: In today’s top stories: GE plans to spin-off its healthcare unit; Chinese stocks enter bear territory; and a federal judge granted a big oil motion to dismiss lawsuits for oil companies to pay for climate change. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
